languages.text:
В глазах застыли ужас и отчаяние:
"Ты лжешь, Тисифона! Я не могу быть тобой! Я — это я..."
Голос Кассии сломался, а по щекам потекли алые слезы.
"Ты знаешь, что это не так, Дитя", — от леденящего голоса звенело в ушах, — "Ты видела — я тебя создала. Ты — Дитя. Ты — это я. Так и должно быть".
"Я... да, я Дитя. Ты — это я. Так и должно быть...", — Кассия обмякла в безжалостной хватке Тисифоны Орселлио и закрыла глаза.

traits.locale_text:
В глазах застыли ужас и отчаяние:
"Ты лжешь, Тисифона! Я не могу быть тобой! Я ... Я — это я..."
Голос Кассии ломается, а по щекам разливаются алые слезы.
"Ты знаешь, что это не так, Дитя", — от леденящего голоса мертвого новатора звенит в ушах, — "Ты видела — я тебя создала. Ты — Дитя. Ты — это я. Так и должно быть".
"Я... да, я Дитя. Ты — это я. Так и должно быть...", — Кассия обмякает в безжалостной хватке Тисифоны Орселлио и закрывает глаза.

languages.text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are me. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

traits.locale_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice broke, and crimson tears began to stream down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice was making {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are I. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are I. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

languages.text:
カシアの瞳には恐怖と絶望が映っていた。
「嘘よ、ティシフォン！あたくしはあなたじゃない！あたくしは、あたくし…」
カシアの声がかすれ、深紅の涙が頬を伝う。
「その言葉こそ嘘だと分かっているのだろう、御子よ」冷徹な声が{name}に耳鳴りとなって届く。「お前はすべてを見た。お前を作ったのはこの私。お前は御子だ。お前が私。それは揺るがぬ」
「あたくしは…ええ、あたくしは御子。あなたはあたくし。それは揺るがない…」カシアは容赦なく握られたティシフォン・オーセリオの手中で、だらりと力をぬいて目を閉じた。
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."

「その言葉こそ嘘だと分かっているのだろう、御子よ」冷徹な声が{name}に耳鳴りとなって届く。「お前はすべてを見た。お前を作ったのはこの私。お前は御子だ。お前が私。それは揺るがぬ」
「あたくしは…ええ、あたくしは御子。あなたはあたくし。それは揺るがない…」カシアは容赦なく握られたティシフォン・オーセリオの手中で、だらりと力をぬいて目を閉じた。

languages.text:
她的眼中充满了恐惧与绝望。
“你在说谎，提西福涅！我不可能是你！我明明是我——”
卡西娅的声音变得嘶哑，深红色的泪水顺着她的脸颊流了下来。
“你很清楚，你这是在自欺欺人，圣子。”女人的声音让{name}不寒而栗。“你看到了一切。是我创造了你，你是圣子。你就是我，必须如此。
“我……没错，我是圣子，你就是我，必须如此……”卡西娅瘫软在提西福涅·奥赛罗冰冷的爪下，闭上了眼睛。
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are me. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

traits.locale_text:
她的眼中充满了恐惧与绝望。
“你在说谎，提西福涅！我不可能是你！我明明是我——”
卡西娅的声音变得嘶哑，深红色的泪水顺着她的脸颊流了下来。
“你很清楚，你这是在自欺欺人，孩子。”女人的声音让{name}不寒而栗。“你看到了一切。我创造了你，你是圣子。你就是我，必须如此。”
“我……没错，我是圣子，你就是我，必须如此……”卡西娅瘫软在提西福涅·奥塞罗冰冷的爪下，闭上了眼睛。

languages.text:
Les yeux emplis d'horreur et de désespoir, elle a répondu :
« Vous mentez, Tisiphone ! Je ne peux pas être vous ! Je suis moi... »
La voix de Cassia s'est brisée, des larmes écarlates roulant le long de ses joues.
« Tu te mens à toi-même, Enfant. » {name} n'a pas pu réprimer des frissons au son de cette voix effrayante. « Tu as tout vu. Je t'ai créée. Tu es l'Enfant. Tu es moi. Il ne peut en être autrement... »
« Je... Oui, je suis l'Enfant. Tu es moi. Il ne peut en être autrement... » Cassia s'est abandonnée à l'étreinte implacable de Tisiphone Orsellio et a fermé les yeux.
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are me. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

traits.locale_text:
Les yeux emplis d'horreur et de désespoir, elle a répondu :
« Vous mentez, Tisiphone ! Je ne peux pas être vous ! Je suis moi... »
La voix de Cassia s'est brisée, des larmes écarlates roulant le long de ses joues.
« Tu te mens à toi-même, mon enfant. » {name} n'a pas pu réprimer des frissons au son de cette voix effrayante. « Tu as tout vu. Je t'ai créée. Tu es l'enfant. Toi et moi. Il ne peut en être autrement. »
« Je... Oui, je suis l'enfant. Vous et moi. Il ne peut en être autrement... » Cassia s'est abandonnée à l'étreinte implacable de Tisiphone Orsellio et a fermé les yeux.

languages.text:
Había terror y desesperación en su mirada.
«¡Mientes, Tisiphone! ¡No puedo ser tú! Yo soy...».
La voz de Cassia se quebró, y unas lágrimas carmesíes surcaron sus mejillas.
«Te engañas a ti misma y lo sabes, niña». La escalofriante voz hacía que a {name} le chirriasen los oídos. «Lo has visto todo. Yo te creé. Tú eres esa niña. Eres yo. Y así ha de ser».
«Yo... Sí, soy la niña. Tú eres yo. Y así ha de ser...». Cassia se quedó inerte en las implacables garras de Tisiphone Orsellio y cerró los ojos.
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are me. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

traits.locale_text:
Había terror y desesperación en su mirada.
«¡Mientes, Tisiphone! ¡No puedo ser tú! Yo soy...».
La voz de Cassia se quebró, y unas lágrimas carmesíes surcaron sus mejillas.
«Te engañas a ti misma y lo sabes, niña». La escalofriante voz hacía que a {name} le chirriasen los oídos. «Lo has visto todo. Yo te creé. Tú eres esa niña. Eres yo. Y así ha de ser».
«Yo... Sí, soy la niña. Tú eres yo. Y así ha de ser...». Cassia se quedó inerte en las implacables garras de Tisiphone Orsellio y cerró los ojos.

languages.text:
In ihren Augen lag Entsetzen und Verzweiflung.
"Ihr lügt, Tisiphone! Ich kann nicht Ihr sein! Ich bin ich -"
Cassias Stimme brach und rote Tränen rannen ihre Wangen hinab.
"Ihr wisst, dass Ihr Euch belügt, Kind." Die markerschütternde Stimme ließ die Ohren von {name} dröhnen. "Ihr habt alles gesehen. Ich habe Euch erschaffen. Ihr seid das Kind. Ihr seid ich. Und so muss es sein."
"Ich ... Ja, ich bin das Kind. Ihr seid ich. Und so muss es sein ..." Cassia erschlaffte in Tisiphone Orsellios gnadenloser Umklammerung und schloss die Augen.
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."

traits.locale_text:
In ihren Augen lag Entsetzen und Verzweiflung.
"Ihr lügt, Tisiphone! Ich kann nicht Ihr sein! Ich bin ich -"
Cassias Stimme brach und rote Tränen rannen ihre Wangen hinab.
"Ihr wisst, dass Ihr Euch belügt, Kind." Die markerschütternde Stimme ließ die Ohren von {name} dröhnen. "Ihr habt alles gesehen. Ich habe Euch erschaffen. Ihr seid das Kind. Ihr seid ich. Und so muss es sein."
"Ich ... Ja, ich bin das Kind. Ihr seid ich. Und so muss es sein ..." Cassia erschlaffte in Tisiphone Orsellios gnadenloser Umklammerung und schloss die Augen.

languages.text:
Gözlerinden dehşet ve ümitsizlik okunuyordu.
"Yalan söylüyorsun Tisiphone! Ben sen olamam! Ben benim..."
Cassia'nın sesi çatladı, yanaklarından kızıl gözyaşları akmaya başladı.
"Kendine yalan söylediğinin sen de farkındasın Çocuk." Ürpertici ses, {name} von Valancius'un kulaklarını uğuldattı. "Her şeyi gördün. Seni ben yarattım. Sen Çocuk'sun. Sen bensin. Bu böyle olmalı."
"Ben... Evet, ben Çocuk'um. Sen bensin. Bu böyle olmalı." Tisiphone Orsellio'nun amansızca esir ettiği Cassia, hareketsiz kalıp gözlerini kapattı.
languages.original_text:
There was horror and desperation in her eyes.
"You lie, Tisiphone! I cannot be you! I am me—"
Cassia's voice cracked and crimson tears started down her cheeks.
"You know you are lying to yourself, Child." The chilling voice made {name}'s ears ring. "You saw everything. I created you. You are the Child. You are me. And so it must be."
"I... Yes, I am the Child. You are me. And so it must be..." Cassia went limp in Tisiphone Orsellio's merciless grasp and closed her eyes.

traits.locale_text:
Gözlerinden dehşet ve ümitsizlik okunuyordu.
"Yalan söylüyorsun Tisiphone! Ben sen olamam! Ben kendimim..."
Cassia'nın sesi çatladı, yanaklarından kızıl gözyaşları akmaya başladı.
"Kendine yalan söylediğinin sen de farkındasın Çocuk." Bu ürpertici sesle {name} von Valancius'un kulakları çınladı. "Her şeyi gördün. Seni ben yarattım. Sen Çocuk'sun. Sen bensin. Bu böyle olmalı."
"Ben... Evet, ben Çocuk'um. Sen bensin. Bu böyle olmalı..." Cassia, Tisiphone Orsellio'nun amansız elinde hareketsiz kalıp gözlerini kapattı.
